findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials on WordPress REST API endpoint can allow attackers to read sensitive page data from authenticated users' sessions.
findings.exploitation_steps: Host malicious JavaScript on attacker domain that makes XHR requests to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials=true, which will succeed due to permissive CORS policy and expose page content/metadata to the attacker's domain.
